name: POLY-Z (Oculus Quest)
description:
A survival and horror adventure through a world of zombies... (no pressure you are armed, you are a cop).

World has changed... as your familly, friends and co workers... In a weird way, so it's time to roll up your sleeves and get your s*** together!!!

 Weapons:

  • Glock 17
  • Police Side-handle baton
  • Knife

 Interactive world:

  • Holster
  • Flash Light
  • Objects
  • Commode
  • Cupboard
  • Décoration
  • Weapons
  • Etc.

Holster for:

  • Flash Light
  • Glock 17
  • Ammo
  • Knife
  • Police Side-handle baton

                                                       ------------------------------------

By GtoG (Gamer to Gamer) 

I'm an independent solo developer from France (Lyon), I hope you will enjoy it.
